foolish.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a foolish action, remark etc is stupid and shows that someone is not thinking sensibly
foolish.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I’ve never heard anything so foolish in all my life.
It would be foolish to ignore his advice.
I was foolish enough to believe him.
be foolish enough to do something
foolish.translation[0].definitions[0].no: In everyday English, people usually say silly or stupid rather than foolish:
It was a silly thing to say.
I felt a bit stupid when she said no.
foolish.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a foolish person behaves in a silly way or looks silly
foolish.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I was young and foolish at the time.
He’d been made to look foolish.
